description: Clearway Energy, Inc. operates in the renewable energy business in the United States. It has approximately 5,000 net megawatts (MW) of installed wind and solar generation projects; and approximately 2,500 net MW of natural gas generation facilities. The company was formerly known as NRG Yield, Inc. and changed its name to Clearway Energy, Inc. in August 2018. Clearway Energy, Inc. was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Princeton, New Jersey. Clearway Energy, Inc. is a subsidiary of Clearway Energy Group LLC.
description_en: Clearway Energy, Inc. operates in the renewable energy business in the United States. It has approximately 5,000 net megawatts (MW) of installed wind and solar generation projects; and approximately 2,500 net MW of natural gas generation facilities. The company was formerly known as NRG Yield, Inc. and changed its name to Clearway Energy, Inc. in August 2018. Clearway Energy, Inc. was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Princeton, New Jersey. Clearway Energy, Inc. is a subsidiary of Clearway Energy Group LLC.
description_uk: Компанія Clearway Energy, Inc. працює у сфері відновлюваної енергетики в Сполучених Штатах. Він має приблизно 5000 чистих мегават (МВт) встановлених проектів вітрової та сонячної генерації; і приблизно 2500 МВт чистих потужностей для виробництва природного газу. Раніше компанія була відома як NRG Yield, Inc., а в серпні 2018 року змінила назву на Clearway Energy, Inc. Clearway Energy, Inc. була зареєстрована в 2012 році та базується в Прінстоні, Нью-Джерсі. Clearway Energy, Inc. є дочірньою компанією Clearway Energy Group LLC.
